title: Ellyse Perry's evolution cements greatness as Australian cricket milestone looms
desc: Cricket superstar Ellyse Perry will become the first woman to play 350 matches for Australia across all formats on Saturday.

title: Glider pilot creates aviation history in Central Australia flying 1,266 kilometres
desc: A Queensland pilot has made aviation history in Central Australia, flying more than 1,200 kilometres without an engine in a record-breaking glider flight launched from Alice Springs.

title: Domenicali positive 2026 will be ‘incredible year’ as he explains possibility to ‘learn’ with new regulations
desc: Stefano Domenicali is feeling “totally positive” that the 2026 season will be an “incredible year”, with the President and CEO of Formula 1 explaining that there will be an opportunity to “learn” from the new regulations.

title: Gable Steveson rolls to 3-0 in MMA, but opts not to call for UFC
desc: Gable Steveson had another dominant showing Thursday, improving to 3-0 in MMA with a first-round TKO win, but he did not call for his next fight to take place in the UFC.

title: BRIN promotes public-private partnership for research vessel project
desc: The National Research and Innovation Agency (BRIN), through its public-private partnership (PPP) project for the National Research Vessel Fleet, is ...

title: Port Pirie's toddlers record highest blood lead levels in a decade
desc: The percentage of two-year-old children above the blood lead level threshold in Port Pirie is the highest in a decade, according to the latest figures.

title: Yash's 'Toxic': Action-Packed Teaser Released, Excitement Soars Ahead of March 19 Release
desc: Rocking Star Yash returns to the big screen in 'Toxic: A Fairytale for Grown-Ups'. The action thriller teaser reveals a fierce character, stunning visuals, and a gripping plot set in Goa's crime underworld. Scheduled for a theatrical release on March 19, it will clash with 'Dhurandhar: The Revenge'.

title: NASA releases report on Boeing's botched Starliner mission
desc: NASA Administrator Jared Isaacman ripped into Boeing and agency leadership for their handling of the Starliner mission during a news conference timed with the release of the 300-page report.

title: Albert Bridge may close for up to a year to repair cracks
desc: Kensington and Chelsea Council says the bridge may open sooner if a "temporary fix" is possible.

title: 'Staff shortage left my sister abandoned in Barnet Hospital A&E'
desc: Chanel Thompson suffered an "unwitnessed" cardiac arrest at Barnet Hospital A&E after one-to-one observation was not provided.
